casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. BERGEN
v.
NORTHGATE MASONRY, INC. 2016-1874 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

Appellant has not filed a merit brief, due February 20, 2018, and therefore has failed to prosecute this cause with the requisite diligence. Sua sponte, cause dismissed.
